conclusion: Preliminary objection partially allowed (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 6-1 as regards failure to communicate the opinion of State Counsel at the Court of Cassation;No violation of Art. 6-1 for the remainder;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF MAÇİN v. TURKEY (No. 2) - [Turkish Translation] summary by the Turkish Ministry of Foreign Affairs
